title: Man of letters
brief_description: Professor Dorton Serry, played by Warren Mitchell, is a Man of Letters. An esteemed philosopher and lover of all women, he controls his world absolutely. So how does he react when the women in his life step out of their allotted roles and challenge his prejudices and philosophies of life? Adapted from the novel by Glen Tomasetti.
